effects.description: Adds 2 × level temporary hearts.
effects.source: Potion/Arrow/Charm of Absorption, Potion/Arrow of Tenacity, Affix Items, Unique Weapons, Delights, Alchemy Flask/Vial, Enchanted Golden Apple, Golden Apple, Totem of Undying, Suspicious Stew

effects.description: Worsens the quality and quantity of loot from mob drops and chests.
Triggers a village raid when entering a village (higher level → tougher raid waves).
effects.source: Killing raid captain, Dread Nog, Suspicious Stew

effects.description: Impairs vision, disables sprinting and critical hits.
effects.source: Illusioner, Delights, Withering Dross, Suspicious Stew

effects.description: Combines Water Breathing, Night Vision and Haste.
effects.source: Being in contact with rain or water within a spherical range of 32-96 blocks from a Conduit, Suspicious Stew

effects.description: Pulsating darkness limits vision radius.
effects.source: Alchemy Flask/Vial, Warden, Sculk Shrieker, Suspicious Stew

effects.description: Increases swim speed.
effects.source: Potion/Arrow/Charm of Dolphins Grace, Depth armor set, swimming near dolphins

effects.description: Grants immunity to fire, including lava and hot blocks.
effects.source: Potion/Arrow/Charm of Fire Resistance, Delights, armor sets from Dungeons and Combat mod, Enchanted Golden Apple, Suspicious Stew

effects.description: Outlines entity making it visible through blocks.
effects.source: Potion/Arrow/Charm/Bamboo Spikes of Glowing, Spectral Potion, Arrow of Spectral Potion, Spectral Arrow, Delights, Bell (to raiders), Suspicious Stew

effects.description: Increases mining speed by 20% × level and attack speed by 10%.
effects.source: Potion/Arrow/Charm of Haste, Potion/Arrow of Divinite, Affix Items, Unique Weapons, Delights, Mask of Rage, Blessed items from Dungeons and Combat mod, Beacon, Suspicious Stew

effects.description: Villagers discount trades and give gifts (higher level → bigger discounts).
Increases food exhaustion by 0.005 × level per tick.
effects.source: Potion/Arrow/Charm/Bamboo Spikes of Hunger, Rotten Flesh, Raw Chicken, Pufferfish, Dark Metal armor set, Husk's attack, Suspicious Stew

effects.description: Makes entity invisible (worn armor and held items remain visible). Invisiblity II prevents particles from being shown.
effects.source: Potion/Arrow/Charm of Invisibility, Alchemy Flask/Vial, Soulstealer weapon from Simply Swords mod

effects.description: Increases jump height by approximately 50% × level and reduces fall damage.
effects.source: Potion/Arrow/Charm of Leaping, Alchemy Flask/Vial, Affix Items, Delights, Mask of Bliss, Bottled Fairy Dust curio, Moa Fodder, Beacon, Suspicious Stew

effects.description: Causes entity to float upward at 0.9 blocks/second × level.
effects.source: Potion/Arrow/Charm/Bamboo Spikes of Levitation, Affix Items, Delights, Fairy Wings curio, Shulker's projectile, Suspicious Stew

effects.description: Improves the quality and quantity of loot from mob drops and chests (higher level → better loot).
effects.source: Potion/Arrow/Charm of Luck, Alchemy Flask/Vial, Avarice Mask, Suspicious Stew

effects.description: Decreases mining speed to 0.3^level of normal speed and attack speed by 10% × level.
effects.source: Potion/Arrow/Charm/Bamboo Spikes of Mining Fatigue, Potion/Arrow of Gigant, Elder Guardian, Suspicious Stew

effects.description: Warps and wobbles the player's vision (higher level → more intense).
effects.source: Potion/Arrow of Tenacity, Delights, Pufferfish, Suspicious Stew

effects.description: Brightens everything to full brightness, including underwater.
effects.source: Potion/Arrow/Charm of Night Vision, Alchemy Flask/Vial, Delights, Luminous Jelly, Glittering Grenadine, Neptunium armor set (only while in water), Forlorn Harbinger armor set's ability, Suspicious Stew

effects.description: Deals 1 damage every 1.25/level seconds (1.25 / 0.625 / 0.417 / 0.3125) but cannot kill (leaves entity at half a heart).
effects.source: Potion/Arrow/Charm/Bamboo Spikes of Poison, Alchemy Flask/Vial, Delights, Cave Spider, Bee, Pufferfish, Poison spells from Iron Spells'n'Spellbooks mod, Suspicious Stew

effects.description: Restores 0.4 every 2.5/level seconds (2.5 / 1.25 / 0.83 / 0.625 / 0.5).
effects.source: Potion/Arrow/Charm of Regeneration, Potion/Arrow of Divinite, Alchemy Flask/Vial, Affix Items, Delights, Golden Apple, Enchanted Golden Apple, Celestial Chant spell from Iron Spells'n'Spellbooks mod, Beacon, Suspicious Stew

effects.description: Reduces incoming damage by 20% × level.
effects.source: Potion/Arrow/Charm of the Turtle Master, Potion/Arrow of Divinite, Alchemy Flask/Vial, Affix Items, Delights, Enchanted Golden Apple, Beacon, Suspicious Stew

effects.description: Decreases fall speed and negates fall damage.
effects.source: Potion/Arrow/Charm of Slow Falling, Alchemy Flask/Vial, Delights, Suspicious Stew

effects.description: Decreases movement speed by 15% × level.
effects.source: Potion/Arrow/Charm/Bamboo Spikes of Slowness, Potion/Arrow of the Turtle Master/Gigant, Alchemy Flask/Vial, Delights, Affix Items, Withering Dross, Rotten Hammer, Stray's arrow, Earthquake spell from Iron Spells'n'Spellbooks mod, Suspicious Stew

effects.description: Increases movement speed by 20% × level.
effects.source: Potion/Arrow of Swiftness/Divinite/Berserking, Charm of Speed, Alchemy Flask/Vial, Delights, Affix Items, Unique Weapons, armor sets from Dungeons and Combat mod, Delights, Beacon, Suspicious Stew

effects.description: Increases attack damage by 3 × level.
effects.source: Potion/Arrow/Charm of Strength, Potion/Arrow of Tenacity/Divinite/Berserking, Alchemy Flask/Vial, Delights, Affix Items, Unique Weapons, Mask of Fury, armor sets from Dungeons and Combat mod, Beacon, Suspicious Stew

effects.description: Prevents drowning and allows waterlogged beds.
effects.source: Potion/Arrow/Charm of Water Breathing, Alchemy Flask/Vial, Delights, Salty Folly, armor sets from Ice and Fire mod, Turtle Shell, Suspicious Stew

effects.description: Decreases attack damage by 4.
effects.source: Potion/Arrow/Charm/Bamboo Spikes of Weakness, Alchemy Flask/Vial, Affix Items, Unique Weapons, Withering Dross, Eye of Cyclops, Cursed Steel Dagger, Suspicious Stew

effects.description: Deals 1 damage every 2 seconds at level I, and every second at level II. Unlike Poison, can kill.
effects.source: Potion/Arrow/Charm/Bamboo Spikes of Wither/Decay, Withering Dross, Ebony weapons and tools from Dungeons and Combat mod, Wither Assault Shoulder Weapon, Wither, Wither Skeleton, Wither Rose, Suspicious Stew

effects.description: Slows movement and drowns entity. Water Breathing prevents the drowning damage.
effects.source: Deep One Mage's Water Bolt splash, Sea Staff with Enveloping Bubble enchantment

effects.description: Allows flying similar to creative flight, but at much faster speed.
effects.source: Jewel of Forlorn Lies, Hood and Cloak of Darkness special ability, Darkened Apple (extends duration only)

effects.description: Removes underwater fog.
Prevents natural regeneration. Level II+ additionally deals 1 damage each 10 seconds / 5 seconds / 2.5 seconds.
effects.source: Nuclear Furnace/Bomb explosions, holding radioactive items, eating Radgill, Raygun blast/Gamma Ray enchantment, Nucleeper/Brainiac/Tremorzilla/Gammaroach attacks

effects.description: Allows interaction with Neodymium blocks without metal armor.
Increases attack damage at low health; affected mobs attack any nearby mobs.
effects.source: Eating or being fed Seething Stew

effects.description: Prevents movement and attacks.
effects.source: Being hit by Primitive Club, eating Stinky Fish, Whirlwind spell from the Goety mod

effects.description: +125% movement speed × level for first 3/4 duration then -50% movement speed × level for final 1/4.
effects.source: Eating Sundae (higher chance), eating any candy from Candy Cavity biome (rare chance)

effects.description: Hostile arthropods ignore the affected player.
Allows walking on ceilings after contacting a block overhead.
Paralyzes arthropods; non-arthropods take damage until they are on a half of their max health.
Violently shakes screen, obstructing vision.
effects.source: Rocky Roller landing on ground nearby during a roll

effects.description: Causes shaking to the inflicted entity, spawns an Enderiophage and deals heavy damage when effect expires.
effects.source: Enderiophage attacks, eating Cosmic Cod (rare chance)

effects.description: Bleeding damage over time (higher level → faster ticks).
effects.source: Frilled Shark attacks, attacking entity using Shield of the Deep

effects.description: Increases movement speed while jumping.
Grants 50% × level knockback resistance.
Clear vision through lava.
Crimson Mosquitoes ignore the affected entity.
Floats to water surface and levitates in rain.
Increases attack speed.
Prevents the user from getting Poisoned and removes existing Poison effect.
Causes extreme slowness and blindness.
effects.source: Can be obtained on April 1st while getting close to a Grizzly Bear

effects.description: Prevents movement; can only move slowly by jumping.
Heals user for a portion of melee damage dealt.
Slows fall speed and extends Elytra flight duration.
Greatly increases fall speed hindering control.
Tigers become friendly, assist the player in combat, and are breedable; ends early if the player attacks a tiger.
effects.source: Feeding Tiger any meat, Affix Items

effects.description: +3 armor toughness.
effects.source: Gained when using Divine tools on effective blocks, effect's length stacks up to 15 minutes

effects.description: Applies bonemeal effect to blocks beneath the player periodically.
Increases experience gained by 4× / 16× / 36× / 64× based on level (formula: 2 × level squared).
effects.source: Affix Items, Potion/Arrow/Charm of Ancient Knowledge

effects.description: Deals 2 × level magic damage every second.
Increases healing received by 20% × level.
If the entity is on fire when the effect expires, deals damage based on remaining fire ticks (higher level → more damage).
Grants creative flight for the duration.
Reduces healing received by 40% × level. Level III prevents health regeneration from all sources.
+20% damage taken × level.
Explodes after delay (higher level → bigger damage and radius).
effects.source: Potion/Arrow/Charm/Bamboo Spikes of Blasting, Bomb Pomegranate

effects.description: Negates fall damage and bounces entity upward upon landing (higher level → more momentum upon landing).
Prevents casting summoning spells.
Grants creative flight and prevents fall damage.
Prevents movement and deals periodic frost damage, scaling with level. Additionaly, the player's hearths and screen edges will frost over.
effects.source: Potion/Arrow/Charm/Bamboo Spikes of Freezing, Frostaya Papaya, Frost Blade, Chill Hide and Frosty Aura from Goety mod, Witch throwing Potion of Freezing, Powder Snow

effects.description: Allows Elytra-like gliding.
Greatly increases fall speed, doubles fall damage, limits flight height.
Highlights nearby magic mobs with a glowing outline.
Increases mana regeneration rate by 10 × level.
effects.source: Potion/Arrow/Charm of Mana Regen, Source Berry meals

effects.description: Adds 0.5 × level hearts to each instance of healing.
Highlights vertical position of nearby budding amethyst.
Reduces incoming damage by 0.5 × level hearts.
Increases lightning and shock damage by 3 × level.
Severely restricts movement and jumping.
Increases spell damage by 1.5 × level.
Increases jump height and allows auto-climbing blocks up to 1 block high.
Reduces sound output.
Temporarily removes sigil effects from Living Armor.
Prevents endermen from teleporting and blocks players from using ender pearls.
Reduces Life Essence gained from Sacrificial Dagger by 90%.
effects.source: Respawning after death, returning from the End

effects.description: Absorbs a portion of incoming damage.
Functions like Poison but can kill the affected entity.
effects.source: Arachnarch's projectile/poison cloud, Nested Spider attack

effects.description: Level I has no effect. Level II+ applies Nausea with intensity 12 - level. Level V+ causes random movement. Level X adds Poison. Drinking milk removes one level.
Deals 1 magic damage every 2 seconds. Higher level reduces the interval and may cause teleportation.
Deals 1 magic damage every 3/1/0.75 second(s), based on level.
Prevents health regeneration from all sources.
effects.source: Leviathan's Abyssal Mine/Orb attacks from Cataclysm mod

effects.description: -20% armor × level and -20% armor toughness × level.
effects.source: Ignis' Infernal Blade/Fireball/Soulfire Slash, Immolator/Sacrificer's Flame Burst, Flame Bulwark/Gauntlet's charge, Blazing Leggings' flame retaliation, Blazing Grips enchantment.

effects.description: Grants immunity to Darkness, Abyssal Fear and Abyssal Burn.
-20% movement speed and -0.15 attack speed.
effects.source: Leviathan's tail swipe, Netherite Monstrosity's charge

effects.description: Reverses movement controls (forward becomes backward, left becomes right). Increases sneak movement speed.
effects.source: Ancient Remnant/Wadjet's sandstorm/obelisk, Ancient Spear's sandstorm

effects.description: +40% movement speed and grants invincibility.
Prevents triggering the resurrection effect of the Cursed Soul Breastplate.
Grants +3 armor × level, +1 armor toughness × level, +0.5 knockback resistance × level and Regeneration equal to level.
Prevents movement and attacks. Reduces FOV and causes camera shakes for players, removes AI from non-player entities.
effects.source: Ignis' shield bash, Ender Guardian's sweep/uppercut/rocket punch, Flame Bulwark/Gauntlet's charge

effects.description: -5% movement speed × level and increases lightning damage taken by 20% × level.
Grants 1 additional Moa wing flap.
Limits damage from undead mobs to 0.5 per hit.
Player actions are not detected by Sculk Sensors and Warden tendrils. Non-player vibrations (dropped items) are still detected.
Corrupts Haste effect, rapidly drains hunger. Breaking blocks restores hunger based on hardness, 5% chance to gain Ravenous Rush.
Corrupts Strength effect, attacks have chance to deal 1.5× damage as critical hit.
Corrupts Absorption, converts absorption hearts to exudation health (4 × level) which takes 1.25× damage but explodes for 4 when hit.
Attacks apply Serrated for 8 seconds to targets.
Corrupts Jump Boost, enables wall climbing while sneaking and increases movement speed by 5% × level.
Increases movement speed by 30% and attack speed by 10%, with additional effects based on active corrupted effects.
effects.source: Delights, Foul Cleaver, Foul Machete (when fully charged)

effects.description: Deals 1 true damage every 0.5 seconds.
effects.source: Serrated Strike enchantment, Feral Bite effect

effects.description: Corrupts Comfort, health regeneration inversely proportional to hunger level, prevents starvation damage.
Corrupts Nourishment, rapidly drains hunger. Attacking restores hunger proportional to damage, killing grants Ravenous Rush for 5 seconds.
Deals 1 magic damage per second for 6 / 16 seconds. Similar to regular fire, this effect ends early if the entity touches water.
effects.source: Acid Fire Edge, Acid Fire Ball, Bottled Acid Fire

effects.description: The player's attacks will apply Acid Fire.
effects.source: Corronding Flame Scepter's Secondary Ability, Mortar And Pestle Of Acid Fire

effects.description: The player's attacks will apply Broken Armor.
effects.source: Mortar And Pestle Of Ammit Powder

effects.description: Deals periodic true damage equal to level every 2 seconds.
effects.source: Affix Items, Sanguine Scepter's Primary Ability, attacks with Crimson weapons and tools

effects.description: The player's attacks will apply Bleeding.
Applies Bleeding to the player for 40 seconds.
effects.source: Ability of Crimson weapons and Ceremonial Dagger

effects.description: Reduces armor by 6.
effects.source: Blessed Gold Twin Blade, attacks with the Ammit Fang Necklace equipped

effects.description: Enemies that attack you will get Burning for 10 seconds.
effects.source: Molten, Cursed Molten and Acid Molten armor sets

effects.description: The player's attacks will set the entity on fire.
effects.source: Mortar And Pestle Of Blaze Powder

effects.description: While under the effect of Bleeding, gain Strength III, Resistance III, Speed III and Haste.
effects.source: Bleeding while wearing full Crimson armor

effects.description: Deals 4 damage per second until it reduces entity's max health by 5 / 6 hearts.
Increases the range from which can mobs detect the player.
Deals 1 damage every 2 seconds and inflicts -50% movement speed.
effects.source: Dungeons and Combat weapons made of Ice Dragonsteel from Ice and Fire mod

effects.description: Increases attack speed by 0.2 / 0.35 and movement speed by 20% / 30%. Also applies Glowing effect for level × 10 seconds to the enemies hit.
effects.source: Hunter Cape, Bear Hood (improves the effect, but does not grant it on its own)

effects.description: Grants immunity to Frostbite.
effects.source: Potion/Arrow of Frozen Resistance, Charm of Ice Resistance

effects.description: The player's attacks will apply Toxin.
Chance to heal yourself while attacking.
Grants 3 additional armor.
effects.source: Armor set bonus of any steel armor from the mod

effects.description: The player's attacks will apply Poison.
Using Sanguine Scepter's Secondary Ability while you have this effect will consume it, restoring 5 hearts.
Deals 4 damage every 5 seconds.
effects.source: Potion/Arrow/Charm/Bamboo Spikes of Intoxicated, Slimy Knife

effects.description: The player's attacks will apply Wither.
Prevents teleportation.
Prevents health regeneration from all sources.
Increases armor by 25% × level.
Treats entity as undead mob, which will burn in sunlight, can only eat rotten flesh, and is immune to the Hunger effect.
Reduces armor by 25% × level.
Grants Enderman traits: randomly teleports entity nearby when damaged and inflicts damage when touching water.
Allows the player to maintain natural regeneration even if they're too hungry to do so normally.
effects.source: Delights, any meal considered a soup or stew

effects.description: Prevents hunger loss from exhausting actions, such as running, jumping and attacking mob. Also fully negates the Hunger effect.
Deals 1 damage every 1.25 seconds, leaving entity alive at half a heart. Unlike Poison, affects undead mobs.
effects.source: Servant attacks while wearing Wild Robe

effects.description: Sets blocks near entity on fire.
effects.source: Volcanic Eruption spell from the mod

effects.description: Increases brewing stand bottle output by 1.
Increases armor by 3. When hit by melee attack, applies Freezing II for 3 seconds to attacker.
effects.source: Calm Focus spell from the mod

effects.description: Killing mobs restores 0.2 × mob max health hunger points, with the minimum of 2 hunger points. Excess hunger points will be converted into saturation instead.
Reduces movement speed by 75%, attack damage by 50%, and attack speed. Removed after healing 80% of max health.
effects.source: Illager servants revived via Ominous Totem

effects.description: When effect expires, instantly kills entity if health below 5% of max health.
Every 4 seconds, shocks up to 2 nearby targets for 4 damage with strong knockback.
Entity with this effect will be randomly teleported within 9 blocks radius after being hit.
Spawns hostile mobs within 16 blocks radius until 16 hostiles present. Cannot be removed with milk.
Creates aura with 2.5 blocks radius that ignites nearby non-fire-immune entities.
Leaves fire trail where entity walks. Does not grant fire resistance.
Melee attacks ignite target for 5 seconds.
Increases knockback received by 100%.
Functions like and stack with Fortune enchantment.
Allows 1 additional mid-air jump before landing.
Creates aura with 2.5 blocks radius that applies Freezing to nearby entities.
Affected entity will drop gold nuggets on death.
effects.source: Gold Touched spell from the mod, being hit by Sage's Staff

effects.description: Multiplies experience drops by 3.
Increases armor by 4 × level.
effects.source: Iron Skin Focus spell from the mod

effects.description: Restores health while in sunlight.
When effect expires, creates explosion without damaging holder (higher level → more damage).
Knocks back the attacker when being hit.
Upon death, this effect is removed while preserving all other status effects. Does not work in Hardcore mode.

Grants full invisibility including armor and increases attack by 1.5. Ends early if the player performs any action other than movement. When effect expires, the player will be teleported back to where the effect was obrainted.
effects.source: Ender Walk Focus spell from the mod

effects.description: Drains soul energy and prevents soul energy regeneration.
effects.source: Necro Set helm's Soul Consuming ability

effects.description: Deals 1 damage every 1.25 seconds and pushes the entity randomly.
effects.source: Storm Staff spell hits from the mod

effects.description: Affected entity will be periodically struck by lightnings.
Increases swim speed and applies Speed while swimming.
Prevents any movement.
effects.source: Tangled Focus spell's roots from the mod

effects.description: Melee attacks apply Poison for 10 seconds to target. Extends to 30 seconds when using Venomous Dagger.
effects.source: Potion/Arrow/Charm of Venomous Hands, Venomous Dagger

effects.description: Next non-void damage dealt to entity is multiplied by 3, then effect is removed. Negated by Void Robe.
effects.source: Void Block, Liquid Void, Broken Void Container, Rift Focus spell explosion from the mod

effects.description: Non-player entities will randomly attack all nearby entities. No effect on players.
Prevents illager servants from being revived by Ominous Totem.
effects.source: Illager servants successfully revived via Ominous Totem

effects.description: Grants immunity to all damage except void and /kill command, and dodges attacks by 1 block while facing attacker.
effects.source: Abyssal Shroud spell from the mod

effects.description: Applies knockback effect, pushing entity away.
Grants gliding ability identical to Elytra, with golden translucent wings appearing on player's back.
effects.source: Angel Wings spell from the mod

effects.description: Applies strong levitation effect, stronger than vanilla Levitation.
Reduces gravity (higher level → less gravity, can become negative causing vertical ascension).
Increases damage to poisoned entities by 5% × level.
effects.source: Aspect of the Spider spell from the mod

effects.description: Reduces healing received by 10% × level and damage dealt by 5% × level.
Increases movement speed, attack damage and spell power (higher level → stronger effects), with lightning effect on body.
Grants immunity to level instances of damage, teleporting to nearby random location each time.
effects.source: Potion/Arrow of Evasion, Ender Step spell from the mod

effects.description: Grants temporary absorption hearts (higher level → more hearts).
Eating food restores mana based on hunger value provided by the food (saturation is ignored).
Applies glowing outline and attracts nearby projectiles (including spell projectiles) to entity.
effects.source: Guiding Bolt spell from the mod

effects.description: Increases attack speed, movement speed and mining speed (higher level → stronger effects).
Grants immunity to all damage during effect, but deals 50% of accumulated damage when effect expires.
Instantly restores mana (higher level → more mana restored).
Reduces incoming damage by 15% plus 5% × level, but also reduces movement speed by 20%.
effects.source: Potion/Arrow of Oakskin, Oakskin spell from the mod

effects.description: Highlights all entities within view range, making them visible through walls (higher level → longer duration).
effects.source: Planar Sight spell from the mod

effects.description: Reduces armor value by 5% × level.
effects.source: Acid Spray, Flame Burst spells from the mod

effects.description: Reduces movement speed (higher level → slower movement).
Indicates presence of summoned undead, with duration matching their natural existence time. Drinking milk removes effect but summoned entities persist.
effects.source: Raise Dead spell from the mod

effects.description: Indicates presence of summoned spectral steed, with duration matching its natural existence time. Drinking milk removes effect but summoned entity persists.
effects.source: Summon Horse spell from the mod

effects.description: Indicates presence of summoned polar bear, with duration matching its natural existence time. Drinking milk removes effect but summoned entity persists.
effects.source: Summon Polar Bear spell from the mod

effects.description: Indicates presence of summoned vexes, with duration matching their natural existence time. Drinking milk removes effect but summoned entities persist.
effects.source: Summon Vex spell from the mod

effects.description: Makes entity invisible, hiding armor and held items. Effect ends when near hostile mobs, dealing damage or receiving damage.
effects.source: Potion/Arrow of Invisibility, Invisibility spell from the mod

effects.description: Increases max health by level.
effects.source: Blood Slash spell from the mod

effects.description: Prevents player from rotating camera view.
effects.source: Frostmaw's ice ball or ice breath attack

effects.description: Allows levitating ground blocks by right-clicking them and launching them by left-clicking (hold right-click to charge for larger platforms).
Grants 3 abilities: Sunstrike (orbital strike), Solar Beam (sustained laser), and Supernova (explosion that consumes effect).
When health is not full, being near fire ignites player, restoring 1 heart per burn. Auto-extinguishes when fully healed. Requires fire resistance or at least 1 fire protection armor piece.
Ignites player when near fire source without contact. Converts to beneficial variant if player has fire resistance or wears at least 1 fire protection armor piece.
Makes player skin appear more blue. Visible to other players.
Spawns hostile mobs within 64 block radius ignoring all conditions for 20 minutes. Cannot be removed by milk.
Displays spawn areas with red-black particles.
Makes player skin appear darker. Visible to other players.
Reduces knockback by 50% at level I and completely negates knockback at level II.
Makes player skin slightly lighter. When combined with Blueberry or Darkening, weakens their visual effects. Visible to other players.
Causes severe screen shaking, flesh-colored filter, loud sounds, and applies Slowness III. Triggered within 5 blocks of any Seven Sins mob.
effects.source: Being near Seven Sins mobs from the mod

effects.description: Spawns one hostile mob from the mod when effect expires.
Deals 0.5 periodically. Cannot be removed by entering water.
effects.source: Walking on Igniter blocks from the mod

effects.description: Spawns Nether Wart Cocoon around entity when effect expires, trapping them.
Increases critical hit chance by 6% × level and critical damage by 4% × level. 50% chance on hit to apply Abyssal Curse to nearby enemies.
effects.source: Shadow Miasma spell from the mod

effects.description: Applies continuous Darkness III and prevents right-click item usage, including casting Iron Spells'n'Spellbooks spells.
effects.source: Anti-Magic Barrier from Spellbreaker Barrier spell from the mod

effects.description: Entities with effect attract each other within 7×7 area. When effect expires, triggers fire spray dealing level - 1 damage.
effects.source: Spiral Slash spell from the mod (requires Infernal Decimator level 2+)

effects.description: Caps single-instance damage at 30% of max health. Excess damage triggers tidal wave dealing level - 1 damage and applying Wet I for 10 seconds.
Increases gravity by 200% × level and reduces movement speed by 100% × level. Cannot be removed with milk.
effects.source: Death Laser spell from the mod

effects.description: Forces entity to attack nearby non-player entities (including passive mobs and armor stands), attacking players only when no other targets exist.
effects.source: Psychic Missiles spell from the mod

effects.description: Increases mana regeneration by 10% × level. Stacks duration and increases level when reapplied.
effects.source: Torrent Slash, Tidal Slash spells from the mod

effects.description: Periodically spawns solar flares at hostile mob positions within range, dealing 2 and igniting them (higher level → larger range and faster interval).
effects.source: Solar Flare spell from the mod

effects.description: Normal attacks with Eternal Vortex's Trident release weakened slashes dealing 12 + (2 × level) damage and applying Wet I for 1 second.
effects.source: Tidal Slash spell from the mod (requires Eternal Vortex's Trident level 2+)

effects.description: Reduces movement speed by 10% × level. When hit by Eternal Vortex's Trident throw, all affected entities in 11×11 area take 50% damage and lose effect.
effects.source: Vortex created by Eternal Vortex's Trident hitting blocks

effects.description: Creates life link with summon: summon damage heals player, player damage heals summon. If player dies, summon sacrifices itself to revive player with 4.
effects.source: Vigor Siphon spell from the mod

effects.description: Reduces frost spell resistance by 2.5% × level and lightning spell resistance by 5% × level.
effects.source: Source Flow spells from the mod

effects.description: Deals 0.4 every 1.25 seconds, causes random movement inputs, and can kill. Cured by White Apple or Skyroot Remedy Bucket.
effects.source: Cockatrice/Poison Dart attacks, Inebriated Arrow, Skyroot Poison Bucket

effects.description: Grants immunity to Inebriation and removes existing Inebriation effect.
Reduces movement speed by 15% × level and encases entity in ice blocks. Stacks multiplicatively with Slowness. Accelerates freezing damage for players.
effects.source: Biome protection charms, Frost Bomb, Winter Wolf/Snow Queen frost breath, Yeti ice throw, Yeti armor effect, Chill Aura enchantment, Frost Bow/Sword

effects.description: Increases damage taken (higher level → more damage).
Outlines player and all visible entities and items with rainbow-colored glow. Causes performance issues and frame drops.
Grants fire immunity and ignites all hostile mobs within 8 block radius.
Grants Frozen immunity and applies Frozen V to all hostile mobs within 8 block radius. Converts certain drops when frozen.
Grants Poison immunity and applies stronger Poison to all hostile mobs within 8 block radius.
Reduces attack damage by 5 and decreases movement speed.
